meta.title: Weed in Barcelona – Map of Cannabis Clubs, Coffeeshops & Weed Cafés
meta.description: Looking for a legal place to smoke marijuana in Barcelona? Explore our curated map of top cannabis clubs, weed cafes, and coffee shops. Follow our step-by-step guide to join a cannabis club today!

map-section.title: Looking for a legal spot to smoke weed in Barcelona?
map-section.subTitle: Discover our cannabis club map and follow our step-by-step guide to join a club near you today!

join-club-section.title: How to join a Cannabis Club ?

card.card1Description: Choose a club from the Map and Click “Join Now“
card.card2Description: Complete the form and wait for your invitation email.
card.card3Description: Visit the club, show your invitation and a Valid ID for registration.
card.card4Description: :Check the rules, annual membership fee, and grab your club Card.
